branchItem.name: VXP2000 Single Unit, Pilot Operated Disk, 2 Port Solenoid Valve
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Body material: Aluminum, Resin, brass, Stainless Steel <LI>Fluid: Air, Gas, Steam, Water and Oil <LI> Port size: Threaded type: 1/4 to 2 inch, Flange type: 32A to 50A <LI>Class B or Class H coil insulation available <LI>Valve type: normally closed and normally open</LI></UL>
